attributes.action: Continue existing self isolation rules for Covid 19.
attributes.additional_details: We ask that the government does not repeal current legislation regarding the need for citizens to isolate following being infected by Covid 19 and to continue the policy of mask wearing in confined indoor areas.
attributes.background: We require parliament to have clear  scientific evidence before they agree to any cessation of the requirement for people who have Covid 19 not to undergo the current period of isolation to avoid risk of contagion the public and particularly those classified as at risk due to  health or age.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606834
